author: Naomi501
title: Disappointing
text:
I have stayed here a couple of times this month for business. I have to say that I seem to be more disappointed each time. The second stay saw a room with cracked window panes, and a shabby divan bed with no valence or cover on the base. Whilst clean and tidy, the bed is uncomfortable and noisy with a cheap mattress.
My stay earlier in the month was for two nights, and on the second day, my coffee supplies weren't replenished , nor was the empty tissue box replaced. I was also lest with dirty towels, despite not having left them on the towel rack.
Wifi is good, and that there are tea and coffee facilities is a plus. Breakfast, for what you pay is disappointing, and the same every day - no variety, nor would it be suitable for different faiths as the cold buffet meats are pork based.
So in summary: shabby; could be better maintained; room supplies need to be replaced after use; more variety with breakfast; good wifi; clean and tidy; and friendly and helpful staff. It is reasonably priced for London, so I guess you get what you pay for.
